title: Bloomberg Markets: Heckman on Fed Struggling With Inflation
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Heckman on Fed Struggling With Inflation
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Dan Heckman National Investment Consultan U.S. Bank Wealth Management Discussing FOMC minutes and concern on that interest rate hikes might go too far.
